Refunds by law: In Australia, consumers have a legal right to obtain a refund from a business for goods purchased if the goods are faulty, not fit for purpose or don't match description. More information at We are happy to credit or exchange any unopened items within 14 days, provided we receive the items in PRISTINE condition. All return postage costs are to be incurred by the buyer. Opened and used item will not be allowed as return due to change of mind or dislike of item. If an item is faulty, or has been incorrectly sent, we will replace or exchange it. Fault claims need to be made within 7 days of item receipt. Postage and handling charges are non-refundable.
